name: Magic Arrow
description:
creates a magical arrow or bolt
that does extra damage

desclines.texta: Converts %d%% Physical Damage to Magic Damage

name: Fire Arrow
description:
magically enhances your arrows
or bolts with fire
always hits

desclines.texta: Converts %d%% Physical Damage to Elemental Damage

name: Inner Sight
description:
illuminates nearby enemies
making them easier to hit
for you and your party

name: Critical Strike
description: passive - your attacks have a chance to do double damage

name: Jab
description:
attacks with a series of rapid thrusts
using a javelin or spear class weapon

name: Cold Arrow
description:
magically enhances your arrows or bolts
by adding cold damage and a slowing effect
cold arrows only do half of their regular damage
always hits

desclines.texta: Converts %d%% Physical Damage to Elemental Damage

name: Multiple Shot
description:
magically splits one arrow
or bolt into many

name: Dodge
description:
passive - you have a chance to dodge
a melee attack when attacking
or standing still

name: Power Strike
description:
adds lightning damage to attacks with
javelin and spear class weapons

name: Poison Javelin
description:
magically enhances your javelin
to leave a trail of poison clouds

name: Exploding Arrow
description:
enchants an arrow or bolt that explodes on
contact, damaging all nearby enemies
always hits

name: Slow Missiles
description: illuminates nearby enemies and slows their ranged attacks

name: Avoid
description:
passive - you have a chance to dodge enemy missiles
when attacking or standing still

name: Impale
description: increases attack damage but rapidly degrades the weapon

name: Lightning Bolt
description: magically converts your javelin into a bolt of lightning

dsc2lines.texta: Converts %d%% Physical Damage to Elemental Damage

name: Ice Arrow
description:
magically enhances your arrow or bolt
to freeze your enemies
always hits

name: Guided Arrow
description:
enhances your arrows and bolts
to track your target
or seek one of its own

name: Penetrate
description: passive - increases your attack rating

name: Charged Strike
description:
adds lightning damage to javelin and spear class weapons
and releases charged bolts upon impact

name: Plague Javelin
description:
magically enhances your javelin to release
expanding clouds of poison upon impact

name: Strafe
description:
magically splits one arrow into several
that target multiple nearby enemies

name: Immolation Arrow
description:
enhances arrows or bolts to
cause severe fire damage and
creates a pyre upon impact
always hits

dsc3lines.texta: %s: %+d%% Average Fire Damage per Second per Level

name: Decoy
description:
creates a duplicate of yourself
that draws fire from enemies

name: Evade
description:
passive - you have a chance to dodge
a melee or missile attack
when walking or running

name: Fend
description: attacks all adjacent targets

name: Freezing Arrow
description:
magically enhances an arrow or bolt
to freeze entire groups of monsters
always hits

name: Valkyrie
description: summons a powerful Valkyrie ally

name: Pierce
description:
passive - your missiles have a chance to
pass through enemies that they hit

name: Lightning Strike
description:
adds lightning damage to javelin and spear class weapons
and releases chain lightning upon impact

name: Lightning Fury
description:
changes a thrown javelin into a powerful
bolt of lightning that splits on impact

name: Fire Bolt
description: creates a magical flaming missile

name: Warmth
description: passive - increases the rate at which you recover mana

name: Charged Bolt
description:
creates multiple, randomly directed
bolts of electrical energy

name: Ice Bolt
description:
creates a magical bolt of ice
that damages and slows your enemies

name: Frozen Armor
description:
increases your defense
and freezes enemies that hit you

name: Inferno
description:
creates a continuous jet of flame
to scorch your enemies

name: Static Field
description:
creates an electrical field that reduces life
of all nearby enemies

name: Telekinesis
description:
uses the power of your mind to
pick up items, use objects,
and knock back enemies

name: Frost Nova
description:
creates an expanding ring of ice that damages
and slows all nearby enemies

name: Ice Blast
description:
creates a magical sphere of ice that
damages and freezes your enemy

name: Blaze
description:
creates a wall of fire
in your wake to scorch your enemies

name: Fire Ball
description:
creates an explosive sphere of fiery death
to engulf your enemies

name: Nova
description:
creates an expanding ring of lightning
to shock nearby enemies

name: Lightning
description:
creates a powerful lightning bolt
to lay waste to your enemies

name: Shiver Armor
description:
increases your defense
freezes and damages enemies that hit you

name: Fire Wall
description:
creates a wall of flame that
burns nearby enemies

name: Enchant
description:
enchants equipped weapon of targeted character or minion
adds fire damage to all weapons

name: Chain Lightning
description:
creates a bolt of lightning that
arcs through several targets

name: Teleport
description: instantly moves to a destination within your line of sight

name: Glacial Spike
description:
creates a magical ice comet
that freezes or kills nearby enemies

name: Meteor
description:
summons a meteor from the heavens
to crush and incinerate your enemies

dsc3lines.texta: %s: %+d%% Average Fire Damage per Second per Level

name: Thunder Storm
description:
summons a deadly thunderstorm that strikes
your enemies with bolts of lightning

name: Energy Shield
description:
creates a magical shield that consumes mana
instead of health when you take damage

name: Blizzard
description: summons massive shards of ice to destroy your enemies

name: Chilling Armor
description:
increases defense and discharges an ice bolt in retaliation
against ranged attackers

name: Fire Mastery
description: passive - increases all damage caused by your fire spells

name: Hydra
description:
summons a multi-headed beast of flame
to reduce your enemies to ashes

name: Lightning Mastery
description:
passive - reduces the mana required
to cast your lightning spells

name: Frozen Orb
description:
creates a magical globe that sprays a torrent of ice bolts
to lay waste to your enemies

name: Cold Mastery
description:
passive - increases the damage of your cold spells
by piercing enemies' resistances to cold

name: Amplify Damage
description:
curses a group of enemies, increasing
the non-magic damage they receive

name: Teeth
description: fires a barrage of summoned barbed teeth

name: Bone Armor
description:
creates an orbiting shield of bone
that absorbs melee damage

name: Skeleton Mastery
description:
passive - increases life and damage
of raised skeletons and revived creatures

name: Raise Skeleton
description:
cast on the corpse of a slain monster,
this raises a skeleton warrior that
fights for you

name: Dim Vision
description:
curses a group of monsters,
reducing their vision radius

name: Weaken
description:
curses a group of enemies,
reducing the amount of damage they inflict

name: Poison Dagger
description: adds poison to your dagger attacks

name: Corpse Explosion
description:
cast on the corpse of a slain monster,
it explodes, damaging nearby enemies

name: Clay Golem
description:
creates a golem from the earth
to fight by your side

name: Iron Maiden
description:
curses a group of enemies, causing them
to damage themselves when damaging others

name: Terror
description:
curses a group of monsters,
causing them to flee in terror

name: Bone Wall
description:
creates an impassable barrier
of bone and debris

name: Golem Mastery
description: Enhances Speed and Life of all your Golems

name: Raise Skeletal Mage
description:
cast on the corpse of a slain monster,
this raises a skeleton mage that
fights for you

name: Confuse
description: curses a monster to force it to attack random targets

name: Life Tap
description:
curses a group of monsters so that
damaging them gives the attacker life

name: Poison Explosion
description:
cast on the corpse of a slain monster,
toxic gas is released
that poisons nearby monsters

name: Bone Spear
description: summons a deadly spike of bone to impale your enemies

name: Blood Golem
description:
creates a golem that shares with you the life
it steals

name: Attract
description:
curses a monster to becomes the
target of all nearby monsters
this curse may not be overridden by another curse

name: Decrepify
description:
curses a group of enemies to make them
slow, weak and take amplified damage

name: Bone Prison
description: creates a barrier of fossilized bone around your target

name: Summon Resist
description:
passive - increases the resistances
of all summoned creatures

name: Iron Golem
description:
transforms a metallic item into a golem that gains
the properties of the item

name: Lower Resist
description:
curses an enemy to take more damage from all magical attacks
lowers resistances of monsters
lowers maximum resistances of hostile players

name: Poison Nova
description: emits an expanding ring of concentrated poison

name: Bone Spirit
description:
releases a spirit of the restless undead that
tracks its target or finds one of its own

name: Fire Golem
description:
creates a golem that converts the damage
it receives from fire into life

name: Revive
description:
returns a monster to life
to fight by your side

name: Sacrifice
description:
increased accuracy and damage
at the cost of life

name: Smite
description:
temporarily stun your enemy
by bashing it with your shield

name: Might
description:
when active, aura increases the damage
done by you and your party

name: Prayer
description:
when active, aura slowly regenerates
the life of you and your party

name: Resist Fire
description:
when active, aura decreases fire damage
done to you and your party

name: Holy Bolt
description:
a bolt of divine energy
that damages demons and undead
or heals allies

name: Holy Fire
description:
when active, aura damages nearby enemies
with heavenly flames
adds fire damage to your attack

dsc2lines.texta: Area damage increases at closer range

name: Thorns
description:
when active, aura reflects melee damage taken by you
and your party back at your enemies

name: Defiance
description:
when active, aura increases the defense
of you and your party

name: Resist Cold
description:
when active, aura decreases cold damage
done to you and your party

name: Zeal
description:
allows you to attack multiple adjacent enemies
with a single attack

name: Charge
description: charge into battle and attack an enemy

name: Blessed Aim
description:
when active, aura increases the attack rating
for you and your party

name: Cleansing
description:
when active, aura reduces the length
of time you and your party
will remain poisoned or cursed

name: Resist Lightning
description:
when active, aura decreases lightning damage
done to you and your party

name: Vengeance
description:
fire, lightning and cold damage are added
to each successful attack

name: Blessed Hammer
description:
summons an ethereal hammer that
spirals outwards damaging enemies it hits

name: Concentration
description:
when active, aura increases the damage and decreases the chance
that the attack will be interrupted for you and your party

name: Holy Freeze
description:
when active, aura freezes nearby monsters
adds cold damage to your attack

dsc2lines.texta: Area damage increases at closer range

name: Vigor
description:
when active, aura increases stamina recovery rate, maximum stamina
and movement speed for you and your party

name: Conversion
description:
converts monsters to fight against
other foul demons and beasts

name: Holy Shield
description: enhances your shield with divine power

name: Holy Shock
description:
when active, aura causes pulses of electricity
to damage nearby enemies

dsc2lines.texta: Area damage increases at closer range

name: Sanctuary
description:
when active, aura damages the undead
and knocks them back

dsc2lines.texta: Area damage increases at closer range

name: Meditation
description:
when active, aura increases mana recovery
for you and your party

name: Fist of the Heavens
description:
lightning strikes your target as holy bolts
seek out nearby enemies

name: Fanaticism
description:
when active, aura increases attack speed
and attack rating for you and your party

name: Conviction
description:
when active, aura reduces the defenses
and resistances of nearby enemies

name: Redemption
description:
when active, aura attempts to redeem
the souls of slain enemies to give
life and mana to you and your party

name: Salvation
description:
when active, aura decreases fire, cold and lightning damage
done to you and your party

name: Bash
description:
powerful blow that increases the damage done
to enemies and knocks them back

name: Blade Mastery
description: passive - improves swords and daggers fighting skill

name: Axe Mastery
description: passive - improves axe fighting skill

name: Mace Mastery
description: passive - improves mace fighting skill

name: Howl
description:
sends nearby monsters
scrambling away in fear

name: Find Potion
description:
use on the corpse of a slain monster
for a chance to find a potion

name: Leap
description:
Jump into the air and knock back
nearby enemies when you land

name: Double Swing
description:
when two weapons are equipped
attacks two targets if possible,
or one target twice

name: Polearm Mastery
description: passive - improves polearm skill

name: Throwing Mastery
description: passive - improves throwing weapon skill

name: Spear Mastery
description: passive - improves spear fighting skill

name: Taunt
description: enrages a monster into relentlessly attacking

name: Shout
description:
warns of impending danger and improves the defense
rating of you and your party

name: Stun
description:
stuns your target for a short time
and increases your attack rating

name: Double Throw
description:
allows you to throw two different
throwing weapons at the same time

name: Increased Stamina
description: passive - increases your stamina

name: Find Item
description:
use on the corpse of a slain monster
to find hidden treasures

name: Leap Attack
description:
leaps to and attacks target enemy
and damages surrounding enemies

name: Concentrate
description:
attack that is not interruptible and
improves attack rating and defense

name: Iron Skin
description: passive - improves defense

name: Battle Cry
description:
fearsome cry that decreases
enemies' defense and damage

name: Frenzy
description:
allows you to swing two weapons at once
each successful attack increases your overall speed
requires you to equip two weapons

name: Increased Speed
description: passive - increases walk and run speed

name: Battle Orders
description:
improves the maximum mana, life and
stamina of you and your party

name: Grim Ward
description:
use on the corpse of a slain monster
to create a frightening totem
that causes nearby monsters to flee

name: Whirlwind
description:
a whirling dance of death
that cuts a path through the
legions of your enemies

name: Berserk
description:
a powerful but reckless attack
that increases damage and attack rating
but decreases defense

name: Natural Resistance
description:
passive - increases natural resistances
to elemental and poison damage

name: War Cry
description: injures and stuns all nearby enemies

name: Battle Command
description: increases all current skill levels for you and your party

name: Raven
description:
summon ravens to peck out
the eyes of your enemies

name: Poison Creeper
description:
disease to all it contacts
summon a vine that spreads

name: Werewolf
description: transform into a werewolf

name: Lycanthropy
description:
passive - improves duration and life
when in werewolf or werebear form

name: Firestorm
description: unleash fiery chaos to burn your enemies

name: Oak Sage
description:
summon a spirit pet that increases
life for you and your party

name: Summon Spirit Wolf
description:
summon a wolf with teleporting ability
to fight by your side

name: Werebear
description:
transform into a werebear
with unstoppable attacks

name: Molten Boulder
description:
launch a boulder of flaming hot magma
that knocks back your enemies

name: Arctic Blast
description:
blast a continuous jet of ice
to burn your enemies with frost

name: Carrion Vine
description:
summon a vine that eats corpses
and replenishes your life

name: Feral Rage
description:
when in werewolf form,
go into a frenzied rage to steal
increasing amounts of life from your enemies
with successive hits

name: Maul
description:
when in werebear form,
maul your enemies
for increasing extra damage
with successive hits

name: Fissure
description:
open volcanic vents below your enemies,
burning them to a crisp

name: Cyclone Armor
description:
shield yourself from damage caused by
fire, cold, and lightning

name: Heart of Wolverine
description:
summon a spirit pet that adds
to the damage and attack rating
of you and your party

name: Summon Dire Wolf
description:
summon a wolf that becomes enraged,
eating corpses to increase damage
it does to enemies

desclines.base_calca: (par6 * lvl) + skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.lvl)* skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.par6)
desclines.calca: (par6 * lvl) + skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.lvl)* skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.par6)

dsc2lines.base_calca: skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.lvl)* skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.par2)
dsc2lines.calca: skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.lvl)* skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.par2)

name: Rabies
description:
when in werewolf form,
bite your enemies
to inflict them with disease
that spreads to other monsters

name: Fire Claws
description:
when in werewolf or werebear
form, maul your enemies
with a fiery claw attack

name: Twister
description:
release several small whirlwinds that
cut a path through your enemies

name: Solar Creeper
description:
summon a vine that eats corpses
and replenishes your mana

name: Hunger
description:
when in werewolf or werebear
form, bite your enemies
to gain life and mana

name: Shock Wave
description:
when in werebear form,
create a shock wave
that stuns nearby enemies

name: Volcano
description:
summon forth a volcano to rain death
and destruction over your enemies

name: Tornado
description:
create a funnel of wind and debris
to blast your enemies

name: Spirit of Barbs
description:
summon spirit pet that reflects damage
taken by you and your party
back at your enemies

name: Summon Grizzly
description: summon a ferocious grizzly bear

dsc2lines.base_calca: skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.lvl)* skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.par6)
dsc2lines.calca: skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.lvl)* skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.par6)

dsc2lines.base_calca: skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.lvl) * skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.par2)
dsc2lines.calca: skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.lvl) * skill('Summon Spirit Wolf'.par2)

name: Fury
description:
when in werewolf form, attack
either multiple adjacent targets
or one target multiple times

name: Armageddon
description:
create a meteor shower to rain fiery
destruction on nearby enemies

name: Hurricane
description:
create a massive storm of wind and
debris to pound your enemies to bits

name: Fire Blast
description:
throw a fire bomb
to blast your enemies to bits

name: Claw Mastery
description:
passive - improves your skill
with claw class weapons

name: Psychic Hammer
description:
use the power of your mind
to create a psychic blast
to crush and knock back your enemies

name: Tiger Strike
description:
Charge-up Skill

consecutive hits add damage bonuses
to finishing moves
must use a dragon finishing move or
normal attack to release charges

name: Dragon Talon
description:
Finishing Move

kick your enemies out of your way
adds charged-up bonuses to the kick

name: Shock Web
description:
throw a web of lightning
to shock your enemies

name: Blade Sentinel
description:
set a spinning blade to patrol
between you and target point

name: Burst of Speed
description:
increases attack and movement speed
for a period of time

name: Fists of Fire
description:
Charge-up Skill

consecutive hits add fire damage
to finishing moves
can only be used with claw class weapons
must use a dragon finishing move or
normal attack to release charges

desclines.texta: Charge 3 - Average Fire Damage: %d-%d per second

name: Dragon Claw
description:
Finishing Move

slice and dice your enemies
with your dual claw class weapons
adds charged-up bonuses to both claw attacks

name: Charged Bolt Sentry
description:
a trap that emits charged bolts
at enemies that pass near

name: Wake of Fire
description: a trap that emits waves of fire

name: Weapon Block
description:
passive - chance to block when
you are using dual claw class weapons

name: Cloak of Shadows
description:
cast a shadow to blind nearby enemies
lowering their defenses for a period of time

name: Cobra Strike
description:
Charge-up Skill

consecutive hits add life and mana stealing
to finishing moves
must use a dragon finishing move or
normal attack to release charges

name: Blade Fury
description:
throw spinning blades
to slice up your enemies

name: Fade
description:
raise all resistances and resist curses
for a period of time

name: Shadow Warrior
description:
summon a shadow of yourself that mimics
your skills and fights by your side

name: Claws of Thunder
description:
Charge-up Skill

consecutive hits add lightning damage
to finishing moves
can only be used with claw class weapons
must use a dragon finishing move or
normal attack to release charges

name: Dragon Tail
description:
Finishing Move

knock back your enemies with an explosive kick
adds charged-up bonuses to the kick

name: Lightning Sentry
description:
a trap that shoots lightning
to scorch passing enemies

name: Wake of Inferno
description: trap that sprays fire at passing enemies

name: Mind Blast
description:
using the power of your mind
stun a group of enemies
and convert the feeble-minded

name: Blades of Ice
description:
Charge-up Skill

consecutive hits add cold damage
to finishing moves
can only be used with claw class weapons
must use a dragon finishing move or
normal attack to release charges

name: Dragon Flight
description:
Finishing Move

teleport to your enemies
and destroy them with a kick
adds charged-up bonuses to the kick

name: Death Sentry
description:
trap that shoots lightning at your enemies
or explodes nearby corpses laying waste to more enemies

desclines.base_calca: skill('mon death sentry'.par3) + skill('mon death sentry'.par4) * (lvl - 1)
desclines.calca: skill('mon death sentry'.par3) + skill('mon death sentry'.par4) * (lvl - 1)

dsc2lines.texta: Corpse Explosion Damage: %d-%d%% of corpse Life

name: Blade Shield
description:
spinning blades slice enemies
who stray too close

name: Venom
description: add poison damage to your weapons

name: Shadow Master
description:
summon a powerful shadow of yourself
to fight by your side

name: Phoenix Strike
description:
Charge-up Skill

adds elemental novas to finishing moves
must use a dragon finishing move or
normal attack to release charges
